parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: Defines the port the HomeKit integration listens on.

parameter.name: pin
parameter.label: Pin
parameter.description: Defines the pin, used for pairing, in the form ###-##-###.

parameter.name: useFahrenheitTemperature
parameter.label: Use Fahrenheit Temperature
parameter.description: Defines whether or not to direct HomeKit clients to use fahrenheit temperatures instead of celsius.

parameter.name: thermostatCoolMode
parameter.label: Thermostat Cool Mode
parameter.description: Defines the string to look for in thermostat heatingCoolingMode characteristics to indicate COOL mode.

parameter.name: thermostatHeatMode
parameter.label: Thermostat Heat Mode
parameter.description: Defines the string to look for in thermostat heatingCoolingMode characteristics to indicate HEAT mode.

parameter.name: thermostatAutoMode
parameter.label: Thermostat Auto Mode
parameter.description: Defines the string to look for in thermostat heatingCoolingMode characteristics to indicate AUTO mode.

parameter.name: thermostatOffMode
parameter.label: Thermostat Off Mode
parameter.description: Defines the string to look for in thermostat heatingCoolingMode characteristics to indicate OFF mode.

parameter.name: networkInterface
parameter.label: Network Interface
parameter.description: Defines the IP address of the network interface to expose the HomeKit integration on.
